title: The Erotic Adventures of Bonnie Moonlight
description: A year ago, I was a lonely, shy woman looking for love. Iâ€™ve never thought of myself as adventurous. Yet one Friday night, on impulse, I brought an incredibly sexy dress and hit the wildest club in town: The Red Room. There I found the man of my dreams. And nightmares. He made me submit to his every desire. No matter how delicious and how much it hurt. . .Warning: This novella is for adults only.
author: Valjeanne Jeffers
